short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds course descriptions to UChicago Classes site

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds course descriptions to the University of Chicago Classes site, which currently for some reason does not have that ability. It pulls descriptions from a database created by Pete Vilter during hack@uchicago's first hackathon.
